title: 148862113.on Weekend Plans And Leverage
excerpt: Most people spend their weekends doing fun things with fun people. Or relaxing at home consuming what’s trending on youtube, netflix and or their local news. Or buying things. Or napping. Or browsing

children.text: Most people spend their weekends doing fun things with fun people. Or relaxing at home consuming what’s trending on youtube, netflix and or their local news. Or buying things. Or napping. Or browsing their feed of choice.
It’s far more boring and difficult to spend that time building your skills, brand or business.
Which is precisely the reason it’s so valuable.
Not everyone’s doing it. Are you?
